meanings.sent1: The rubbled building was difficult to navigate through.
meanings.sent2: The street was rubbled after the earthquake.
meanings.sent3: The kids made a fort out of rubbled boxes in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt rubbled after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The rubbled landscape looked like a scene from a war movie.

meanings.sent1: The rubbled house was beyond repair.
meanings.sent2: The once beautiful garden was now rubbled.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so delicious that it was rubbled in minutes.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were rubbled when he didn't get the job.
meanings.sent5: The rubbled city bore the scars of a devastating war.
